channel.title: how to increase jutsu range?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "how to increase jutsu range?" - how to go beyond 1-10

item.title: Re: how to increase jutsu range?
item.content:encoded:
Special jonin gives you a range of 12 in one stat. Ninja dog gives +1 ninjutsu range. You're a special jonin in taijutsu and you have a ninja dog.

Get to jonin rank or buy a chakra armor to get more range.

item.title: how to increase jutsu range?
item.content:encoded: somehow my tai jutsu range has increased to 12 and ninjutsu to 11 but genjutsu has not changed. I don't know what I did but how do I increase the range of each? thanks.
